title: 我的世界1.12.2没声音
author: DALAO666
txt_content: 游戏是国际正版的，1.8.9有声音，1.9.4也有声音，就1.12.2没声音，怎么解决，急急急

replies.author: 袋里的鲨
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... dertype=1#pid547863
尝试补全声音文件？

replies.author: Jamfly
replies.txt_content: 去任意启动器里下载资源文件

replies.author: 永远爱mimi
replies.txt_content:
newtab:http%3A//www.mcbbs.net/forum.php%3Fmod%3Dviewthread%26tid%3D38297%26page%3D48%26ordertype%3D1%23pid547863

replies.author: MC_NoColor
replies.txt_content: 你好，可以补全声音文件，如果还有问题的话尝试切换一下语言再换回来

replies.author: qnickx
replies.txt_content: 确认在启动器里下载了对应版本的声音文件吗

replies.author: DALAO666
replies.txt_content:
qnickx 发表于 2018-2-20 10:51

replies.txt_content: 删除重下就可以要是还不行加QQ2889726574我帮你希望采纳
